helpText.productSelection: Select the product to be linked to the counter.
helpText.oldPrice: This is the price that is displayed crossed out. The field is prefilled based on the selected product. Please do not enter currency sign.
helpText.newPrice: This is the discounted price. The price is displayed prominently.
helpText.startDateTime: Set a start date when the timer will begin.
helpText.endDateTime: Set an end date when the timer will expire.
helpText.showBeforeStart: If this option is active, the timer will be displayed with a teaser text before the start date.
helpText.teaserText: Enter here the teaser text to be displayed before the deal starts.
helpText.showBadge: Activate a hint badge in the product.
helpText.badgeText: For example, in this badge you can output 'Discount %'.
helpText.activateCustomDescription: If this field is active, you can write your own product description as an alternative to the original one.
helpText.customCss: Here you can insert custom CSS. Note that this field is not set specifically for the element. So global classes and IDs affect the whole store.
helpText.endTimerHide: When the timer expires, the deal counter in the frontend will be hidden automatically.
